data.title: SAP - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
SAP has acquired 63 companies, including 11 in the last 5 years. A total of 12 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 5 assets.
                SAP’s largest acquisition to date was in 2014, when it acquired Concur Technologies for $8.3B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2020, when it

data.text:
SAP M&A Summary

SAP has acquired 63 companies, including 11 in the last 5 years. A total of 12 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 5 assets.

SAP’s largest acquisition to date was in 2014, when it acquired Concur Technologies for $8.3B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2020, when it sold SAP Digital Interconnect to Sinch AB for $254M. SAP has acquired in 11 different US states, and 10 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include software (60%) and information technology (22%).

SAP Business Overview
